statements: SELECT * FROM mutual_connections WHERE user_id = 1 AND friend_id = 2
SELECT user_id, friend_id FROM mutual_connections WHERE connection_strength > 5
SELECT * FROM mutual_connections ORDER BY connection_strength DESC
SELECT friend_id, user_id FROM mutual_connections WHERE user_id = 2 AND friend_id = 1
SELECT MAX(connection_strength) AS max_strength FROM mutual_connections
SELECT user_id, friend_id, connection_strength FROM mutual_connections WHERE connection_strength > 5 ORDER BY connection_strength DESC, user_id ASC
SELECT * FROM mutual_connections WHERE user_id = 1 AND friend_id IN (2, 3, 4) ORDER BY connection_strength DESC
SELECT friend_id, connection_strength FROM mutual_connections WHERE connection_strength BETWEEN 3 AND 7 ORDER BY friend_id DESC
SELECT user_id, friend_id FROM mutual_connections WHERE user_id != friend_id ORDER BY user_id, friend_id
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM mutual_connections WHERE connection_strength < 5 ORDER BY user_id ASC
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT name, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id_1, user_id_2, connection_date FROM connections WHERE user_id_1 = 1;
SELECT user_id_1, user_id_2, connection_date FROM connections ORDER BY connection_date DESC;
SELECT name, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1 OR user_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM users WHERE user_id IN (2, 3, 4);
SELECT user_id_1, user_id_2, connection_date FROM connections ORDER BY connection_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM connections WHERE user_id_1 = 1 OR user_id_2 = 1;
SELECT u.name, c.connection_date FROM users u INNER JOIN connections c ON u.user_id = c.user_id_1 WHERE u.user_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users;
SELECT email, username, user_id FROM users;
SELECT connection_id, user_id, friend_id FROM connections;
SELECT friend_id, user_id, connection_id FROM connections;
SELECT user_id, friend_id, mutual_connection_id FROM mutual_connections;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM connections ORDER BY connection_id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id, friend_id FROM mutual_connections WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT u.username, c.connection_id FROM users u INNER JOIN connections c ON u.user_id = c.user_id ORDER BY c.connection_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT * FROM connections WHERE connection_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, friend_user_id FROM friends WHERE friend_since < '2022-03-15';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE date_joined >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT u.username, f.friend_since FROM users u JOIN friends f ON u.user_id = f.user_id WHERE f.friend_user_id = 2;
SELECT u.username AS recommended_user, r.recommendation_date FROM users u JOIN recommendations r ON u.user_id = r.recommended_user_id WHERE r.user_id = 3;
SELECT u.username, c.connection_date FROM users u JOIN connections c ON u.user_id = c.user_id_1 OR u.user_id = c.user_id_2 ORDER BY c.connection_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM user_accounts;
SELECT username, email FROM user_accounts WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_accounts ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM user_accounts WHERE username LIKE 'j%';
SELECT * FROM connections WHERE connection_strength > 50;
SELECT * FROM user_accounts WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, email FROM user_accounts ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT u.username, c.connection_strength FROM user_accounts u JOIN connections c ON u.user_id = c.user_id1 WHERE c.connection_strength > 50;
SELECT r.to_user_id, r.status FROM friend_requests r WHERE r.from_user_id = 1 AND r.status = 'pending';
SELECT m.user_id1, f.friend_id FROM mutual_connections m JOIN recommended_friends f ON m.user_id2 = f.user_id WHERE f.connection_strength >= 70;
